(1903x1+0)/1 mod 32768 = 1903. (1903x3+1)/2 mod 16384 = 2855. (1903x9+5)/4 mod 8192 = 4283. (1903x27+19)/8 mod 4096 = 2329. (1903x81+65)/16 mod 2048 = 1446. (1903x81+65)/32 mod 1024 = 723. (1903x243+227)/64 mod 512 = 61. (1903x729+745)/128 mod 256 = 92. (1903x729+745)/256 mod 128 = 46. (1903x729+745)/512 mod 64 = 23. (1903x2187+2747)/1024 mod 32 = 3. (1903x6561+9265)/2048 mod 16 = 5. (1903x19683+29843)/4096 mod 8 = 0. (1903x19683+29843)/8192 mod 4 = 0. (1903x19683+29843)/16384 mod 2 = 0. (1903x19683+29843)/32768 mod 1 = 0.
